about_the_game:
The following characters' costumes will be available in Free Battle and Online Battle of NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution:
The Third Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Itachi (w/o Cloak)
Kakashi (Kakuzu Battle Costume)
The First Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Zabuza (Hidden Mist Costume)
detailed_description:
The following characters' costumes will be available in Free Battle and Online Battle of NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution:
The Third Hokage (Hokage Costume)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher with latest Service Pack
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core or AMD
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video cards Pixel Shader 4.0 (Geforce 8xxx-ATI HD2xxx)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher with latest Service Pack
  • Processor: Intel i3-530, 2.93Ghz / AMD Phenom II X4 940, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB video card, Pixel Shader 4.0, DirectX10 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: This pack contains additional costumes for the Third Hokage, Itachi, Kakashi, the First Hokage, and Zabuza.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
